title: Hextech Tab Location?
body: Just curious if this has been implemented yet and if so, the location of the tab. Thank you.

replies.body: unfortunately no the Alpha client is just the skeleton so far. All these things will be added at a much later date

> [{quoted}](name=SHANTO,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=fdehqf4l,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-01T05:26:42.786+0000)
>
> unfortunately no the Alpha client is just the skeleton so far. All these things will be added at a much later date

Agree. Not even shop is implemented yet, this is still an _Alpha_.

{{champion:17}}
